name: homo
content:
an offensive word for a gay man
the genus (= biological group) that includes modern humans and other extinct human species: The tools might have been made by an as-yet-undiscovered early species of the genus Homo.

the biological group that includes modern humans, or a member of that group: The tools might have been made by an as-yet-undiscovered early species of the genus Homo.
